articles.title: Sriracha shortage coming? Company pauses production until after Labor Day - Fox Business
articles.description: Huy Fong Foods, a leading sriracha producer out of California, warned in a letter this week to wholesalers that a shortage is coming due to an issue with its jalapeño chili peppers.
articles.content:
Fans of sriracha sauce may find themselves scrambling — again — to get a hold of the spicy condiment.
